entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Invermere
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches over southern sections early this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
